subject: College Athletics
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football
Interscholastic Athletics
lead_paragraph: Brian Butler, who represents high school football players in Kansas, is at the center of a debate over college recruiting: is he brokering his clients’ futures for personal gain or helping them gain exposure?
